channel.title: Vesta Special & barrage Help

item.title: Vesta Special & barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @cocain cocain
item.description:
@cocain wrote:

Thanks i would Rep++ if i could. Now i’m going try the magic timer like you said.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2009, 12:09:45 pm[/size][hr][quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:2, topic:321449”]If your barrage method has an entangletimer increase it to 20 seconds. If it doesn’t add one and make the entangletimer and set the timer to 20 seconds. If that doesn’t work i’m sure there’s a tutorial for on google, the only other way i could find out is pulling my whole barrage method out. For the special add this: hitDiff = misc.random(100); below the getHit. Also remember to do the same to your npcspecials method.[/quote]I couldn’t find anything on an entangletimer anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta Special & barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

If your barrage method has an entangletimer increase it to 20 seconds. If it doesn’t add one and make the entangletimer and set the timer to 20 seconds. If that doesn’t work i’m sure there’s a tutorial for on google, the only other way i could find out is pulling my whole barrage method out. For the special add this: hitDiff = misc.random(100); below the getHit. Also remember to do the same to your npcspecials method.

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta Special & barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @cocain cocain
item.description:
@cocain wrote:

Can anyone here help me make barrage freeze u so you cant do “follow” or “attack” to move. It makes u unable to walk normally but if you right click on someone and do “attack” they walk over to you or if you do “follow” does the same thing. Help plz

Base: Delta

Vesta Special

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10010 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(false, 50, 248, 1058); getHit(100); }

What should i change in that to make the special right, and maybe hit higher as well.

Read full topic
